TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BaseParser extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides a base set of functionality for classes involved in parsing ASP.NET page requests and server controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Parsing involves all ASP.NET server controls, including pages and user controls.
